text: Marty Riessen and Margaret Court were the defending champions but lost in the final 6–3, 3–6, 7–6 against Owen Davidson and Billie Jean King. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top Half=== ===Bottom Half=== ==Notes== ==References== ==External== *1973 US Open – Doubles draws and results at the International Tennis Federation Mixed Doubles Category:US Open (tennis) by year – Mixed Doubles
title: 1973 US Open – Mixed Doubles
